data.text: @LiberationistMA @SameeraKhan No need to cry or being melodramatic. Its time that non whites tell the racist whites to go back to their country. This is the only language they understand. America is not a White people's country. Like us, they are immigrants as well.

@LiberationistMA Unfortunately, I have seen this as well.  We need society to stand up against racism and show that it’s not socially acceptable to act like a racist.  It won’t stop idiots from actually being racist, but it will make the acts unacceptable in public. https://t.co/bGCJsY9YOc
@LiberationistMA Man sickening story I hate white racists they cowards. https://t.co/7xU7BHxfV1
@LiberationistMA He's beautiful  and you both and your family deserve to be safe and protected, and feel that way.
@LiberationistMA Oh my god, racist mofos gots to go
@LiberationistMA @Penny_G So very sorry. Some people in this world are just plan evil.

@LiberationistMA I’m 100% with you, I have young children too. The way race discussed in 🇺🇸 isn’t on the right track. They use race to cover class, and media and politicians make people hate each other, therefore create drama so they can get views and votes, capital only cares about profit.
